areas.areasInformation: oPorto Research, Technology & Innovation Center includes unities and groups with different activities that involve different levels of knowledge and innovation, as well as, knowledge areas.
areas.nAreasDesc: PORTIC has a total of {n} areas.
areas.areasFocusDesc: We focus in a big diversity of technologies and areas of actuation.
areas.areasStructureDesc: The super-structure PORTIC incorporates multiple infrastructures of Instituto Politécnico do Porto - IPP.
areas.areasCoopDesc: As a consequence of its development, a cooperation exists among all the infrastructures and partners.
areas.infoDesc: Down on the page we give information about the categories and the areas that are part of PORTIC.

aboutUs.introduction: O PORTIC -Porto Research, Technology & Innovation Center visa agregar vários centros e grupos de investigação das escolas do P.PORTO num único espaço físico, configurando uma superestrutura dedicada à investigação, transferência de tecnologia, inovação e empreendedorismo. Alojará ainda a Porto Global Hub que integra a Porto Design Factory, a Porto Business Innovation e a Startup Porto e que tem como visão ajudar a criação de projetos locais sustentáveis para uma vida melhor.
aboutUs.testimonialsTitle: … and now what they say about us
aboutUs.testimonialsDesc: We provide our clients the best services possible and they give us amazing feedback.

courses.coursesTitle3Desc: Possibility of corporate with different national and international clients.
courses.coursesTitle4Desc: With our courses, students build a strong portfolio with the knowledge acquired.
courses.infoDesc: Down on the page we give information about the courses that PORTIC is part of, and information about the categories and areas that the courses are part of.

icons.title: Our courses focuses
icons.desc: Porto Design Factory offers many educational programs, with different durations, goals and pedagogic methodologies, that groups Bachelor’s Degrees students, Master Degrees students, Doctoral Degree e After-doctoral Degree, or even professional technicians and employees.
